content: Secret! We won't tell you how to unlock this one.
Have a save file for Friday Night Funkin' Soft or Play It's Complicated (Sayori Mix) with the Festival Costume on Mirror Mode.
Have a save file for Doki Doki Literature Club! or Doki Doki Literature Club Plus! or beat Our Harmony with all casual costumes!
Find and click on a certain succubi in the Sticker Gallery Menu.
Beat every song in Doki Doki Takeover at least once.
Get an accuracy of 90% or higher on It's Complicated (Sayori Mix).
Get an accuracy of 90% or higher on Beathoven (Natsuki Mix).
Get an accuracy of 90% or higher on Crucify (Yuri Mix).
Get an accuracy of 90% or higher on Glitcher (Monika Mix).
Get an accuracy of 90% or higher on Constricted.
Have a save file for Vs. Sunday or play Baka on Mirror Mode.
Have a save file for Vs. Tabi or play Obsession on Mirror Mode.
Beat Wilted on Mirror Mode.
Find and click on a certain vulgar assassin in the Art Gallery Menu.
Experience a Bad Ending or beat Joyride on Mirror Mode.
Have a save file for Hotline 024 or beat BOTH Deep Breaths and Poems n' Thorn on Mirror Mode.
Pick Yuri on You and Me.
Pick Sayori on You and Me.
Pick Natsuki on You and Me.
Pick Yuri on Catfight.
Pick Monika on You and Me.
Get an accuracy of 90% or higher on Drinks on Me.
Play an alternate version of Epiphany.
Get an accuracy of 90% or higher on Your Demise.
Play Love n' Funkin' on Mirror Mode.
Play My Confession on Mirror Mode.
Pick Natsuki on Catfight.
Play Shrinking Violet on Mirror Mode.
Play Reconciliation on Mirror Mode.
Fail You and Me by not picking a doki.
